row.Author: IBM
row.name: IBM Streams Water Conservation Starter Kit
row.description: Starter kit for smart and connected sprinkler system using Apache Edgent, Streaming Analytics and Insights for Weather
row.search: Stream water conservation starter Kit

row.Author: IBM
row.name: ChatBot - A Voice-enabled native Android app
row.description: An Android ChatBot powered by IBM Watson Services (Conversation and Text-to-Speech) on IBM Bluemix.
row.search: Build an Android on app, build an ChatBot for Android

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Todo Apps for web and mobile
row.description: The ToDo sample apps are meant to be simple demos of how you can take advantage of Bluemix and a database service. In addition it shows how to take advantage of both the built-in and community buildpacks to deploy your app using whatever runtime you choose.
row.language: NodeJS, Java, Rails, Swift, PHP, Python
row.search: Build a simple php todo app, Build a simple Node.js todo app, Build a simple Swift todo app, Build a simple IOS todo app, Build a simple Java todo app, Build a simple Python todo app, Build a simple Rails todo app,

row.Author: IBM
row.name: News Intelligence
row.description: The News Intelligence application was created to highlight the combination of the AlchemyData News, Alchemy Language, and Tone Analyzer services as a News Intelligence tool
row.search: Build a news application using IBM Bluemix services

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: BluePic
row.description: BluePic is a photo and image sharing sample application that allows you to take photos and share them with other BluePic users. This sample application demonstrates how to leverage, in a mobile iOS 10 application, a Kitura-based server application written in Swift.
row.search: Build a swift app with IBM Bluemix

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: OpenFridge
row.description: The Internet of Things enables manufacturers and their customers to make more efficient use of consumer devices by attaching them to a network. Software running on a device at the edge that is paired with analytics in the cloud promises to improve quality of service and lower cost of maintenance resulting in better customer satisfaction.
row.search: Build an IoT application with using OpenWhisk, OpenWhisk and IoT on Bluemix

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: IBM-Blockchain - Commercial Paper
row.description: This application is a demonstration of how a commercial paper trading network might be implemented on IBM Blockchain.
row.search: Blockchain on Bluemix

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Cloud Insurance Co.
row.description: Cloud Insurance Co. is a collection of experimental Watson & Bluemix concepts applied to the insurance domain.
row.search: Build an insurance app, app for insurance, insurance with node

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Logistics Wizard
row.description: The Logistics Wizard is an end-to-end, smart supply chain management solution that showcases how to execute hybrid cloud, microservices, and predictive data analytics in the real world.
row.search: build a smart supply chain management solution, build a microservices application

row.Author: Bluemix & Watson Team
row.name: ChatBot - Car Dashboard
row.description: Application that demonstrates how the Conversation service uses intent capabilities in an animated car dashboard UI.
row.search: build a chatbot using IBM Bluemix, Build a car dashboard chatbot

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Cognitive Concierge - end-to-end Swift
row.description: CognitiveConcierge is an end-to-end Swift application sample with an iOS front end and a Kitura web framework back end. This application also demonstrates how to pull in a number of different Watson services to your Swift client and server side apps via the Watson Developer Cloud's iOS SDKs, including Conversation, Text to Speech, Speech to Text, and the Alchemy Language APIs.
row.search: build a swift app, build ios app with swift on Bluemix

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Image tagging & Face detection
row.description: Vision App is a sample iOS application to automatically tag images and detect faces by using IBM visual recognition technologies.
row.search: Build a visual app, build image tagging application, build an iOS application to automatically tag images and detect faces

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Dark Vision - Discover dark data in videos
row.description: Dark Vision processes videos to discover dark data. By analyzing video frames with IBM Watson Visual Recognition, Dark Vision builds a summary with a set of tags and famous people or building detected in the video. Use this summary to enhance video search and categorization.
row.search: build Video Analyzer app, build an app to analyze videos

row.Author: IBM
row.name: David Bowie personalities
row.description: Exploring David Bowie's lyrics with Python, Watson & Bluemix
row.search: Build an tone app, lyrics with Python, Watson & Bluemix

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Your Celebrity Match
row.description: Compare your Twitter profile against celebrities. Enter your Twitter handle to see which celebrities have the most similar (and different) personalities to yours!
row.search: build a Social Media app, build an app to discover the similarities

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Real Time Tone Analysis
row.description: Real Time Tone Analysis samples dictation or conversations and displays a real-time transcription and an accompanying chart that plots the emotional, social, and writing tone of the language. The project is an experiment that combines the Watson Speech to Text and Tone Analysis services, integrating them in a node.js backend running on IBM Bluemix.
row.search: Build an app to analysis tone, tone Analysis app

row.Author: IBM
row.name: Serverless Slack Application
row.description: This sample shows how to build a serverless Slack app using Slack Events API to receive events, with IBM Bluemix OpenWhisk actions to process these events, and how to expose these actions with API Connect.
row.search: build an app using OpenWhisk, build a serverless app, build an app using OpenWhisk and slack

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Java EE Stock Trading
row.description: Learn how to bring code from GitHub into your local Eclipse workspace, build and deploy the application to Bluemix, and consume a database services and other services in the cloud.
row.search: build a java app on bluemix, build a java app on the cloud

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Online Store Catalog
row.description: The Store Catalog Mobile Backend uses an API Connect Node.js runtime with the Cloudant NoSQL DB, Object Storage, Mobile Client Access, Push Notifications, and Mobile Analytics services on Bluemix. The template exhibits common architectural design patterns that developers can use to model their backend on Bluemix for mobile applications. This backend has been created to support the new IBM Mobile Dashboard Store Catalog template. It has the the ability to browse a list of products and supports the viewing of images for each item in the product list.
row.search: build an online store application, build an application using API Connect and Node.js

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Alchemy Language API's
row.description: AlchemyLanguage is a collection of APIs that offer text analysis through natural language processing. This set of APIs can analyze text to help you understand its concepts, entities, keywords, sentiment, and more. Additionally, you can create a custom model for some APIs to get specific results that are tailored to your domain.
row.search: build an app using Alchemy API's, use API's services in yoru mobile or web applications

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Food-coach ChatBot
row.description: This application demonstrates how the Conversation Service can be adapted to use Tone Analyzer's tone along with intents and entities in a simple chat interface advising users with their food
row.search: build a ChatBot app, build food coach app

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Conversation Enhanced
row.description: This application demonstrates the combination of the Conversation and Retrieve and Rank services. First, users pose questions to the Conversation service. If Conversation is not able to confidently answer, Conversation Enhanced executes a call to Retrieve and Rank to provide the user with a list of helpful answers.
row.search: build an app with deep conversations, build a ChatBot

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Tone Analyzer
row.description: This service uses linguistic analysis to detect and interpret emotions, social tendencies, and language style cues found in text.
row.search: build a Tone Analyzer

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Visual Recognition
row.description: Understand the contents of images. Create custom classifiers to develop smart applications. Create custom collections to search for similar images.
row.search: build a visual recognition app, build a visual app

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Personality Insights
row.description: Uncover a deeper understanding of people's personality characteristics, needs, and values to drive personalization.
row.search: build a social media collection app, build a personality insight app

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Language Translator
row.description: The IBM Watson Language Translator service converts text input in one language into a destination language for the end user using background from domain-specific models. Translation is available among Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Korean, Portuguese, German, and Spanish (some languages may not be available for all domains).
row.search: build a language translator app, translate your app or website

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Document Conversion
row.description: The Document Conversion service transforms HTML, PDF, and Microsoft Word documents into normalized HTML, plain text, or sets of Answer units. The Answer units can be run through a utility to convert it to the Solr JSON file type needed to train the Retrieve and Rank service.
row.search: convert your documents with IBM Watson document conversion service

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Natural Language Classifier
row.description: Interpret and classify natural language with confidence.
row.search: Enhance your app with Watson Natural Language Classifier service

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Speech Service
row.description: Designed for streaming low-latency synthesis of audio from written text. The service synthesizes natural-sounding speech from input text in a variety of languages and voices that speak with appropriate cadence and intonation.
row.search: Text to speech app, speech to text app

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Discovery
row.description: Rapidly build a cognitive search and content analytics engine and add it to existing applications with minimal effort.
row.search: Build an app with Watson Discovery

row.Author: Bluemix Team
row.name: Watson Tradeoff Analytics
row.description: Helps users make better choices to best meet multiple conflicting goals.
row.search: Build an app with Tradeoff Analytics to make better choices, build an app to make better choices, better choices app
